rules.description: JFS Application a risk - 335 days of submission
rules.formula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Workflow__c && OR( ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Submitted') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Under Reviewer Review') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Approver Review In Progress') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned to Reviewer') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned for Revision')) && OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Child Care Center' ,CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type A Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type B Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Day Camp' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'In-Home Aide' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Out of State Registration') && OR( RecordType.Name = 'Application - CC Center',RecordType.Name = 'Application - FCC' , RecordType.Name = 'Application - ODE Program' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Day Camp' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Out of State' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - In-Home Aid')

rules.description: JFS Close the Application - 395 days after submission if it isn't approved or denied
rules.formula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Workflow__c && OR( ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Submitted') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Under Reviewer Review') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Approver Review In Progress') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned to Reviewer') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned for Revision'),ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Application Revised')) && OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Child Care Center' ,CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type A Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type B Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Day Camp' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'In-Home Aide' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Out of State Registration') && OR( RecordType.Name = 'Application - CC Center',RecordType.Name = 'Application - FCC' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Day Camp' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Out of State' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - In-Home Aid')

rules.description: JFS Close the Application - 395 days after submission if it isn't approved or denied
rules.formula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Workflow__c && OR( ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Submitted') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Under Reviewer Review') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Approver Review In Progress') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned to Reviewer') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned for Revision')) && OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Child Care Center' ,CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type A Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'FCC - Type B Home' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Day Camp' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'In-Home Aide' , CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Out of State Registration') && OR( RecordType.Name = 'Application - CC Center',RecordType.Name = 'Application - FCC' , RecordType.Name = 'Application - ODE Program' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Day Camp' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - Out of State' , RecordType.Name = 'Registration - In-Home Aid')

rules.description: ODE Application a risk - 335 days of submission
rules.formula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Workflow__c && OR( ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Submitted') ,ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Under Reviewer Review') , ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Returned for Revision')) && OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'School Age Child Care' ,CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Pre School') && RecordType.Name = 'Application - ODE Program'

rules.description: ODEClose the Application - 395 days after submission if it isn't approved or denied
rules.formula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Workflow__c && NOT(ISNULL(Submission_Date1__c)) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Approved')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Transaction_Status__c , 'Denied'))) && OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'School Age Child Care' ,CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = 'Pre School')
